    • Method Detail

      • exitThread

        public boolean exitThread()
        Backs up to parent thread
        Returns:
        true if there was a thread to exit to, false if there is no parent thread

      • enterThread

        public void enterThread(ThreadModel thread)

      • refreshThreads

        public void refreshThreads()
        If a network connection exists, pull the latest and greatest from ElasticSearch

        ThreadListModel is populated with the results from ElasticSearch

      • editThread

        public void editThread(ThreadModel thread)
        Responds to the users desire to edit a thread.

        editingTopic is set to true to represent that the user is editing a topic. The thread is saved in expectation that the user will finish the prompt and that the new model can be updated and inserted into the appropriate persistence models in other methods.

        Parameters:
        thread - that the user is editing

      • replyThread

        public void replyThread(ThreadModel thread)
        Responds to the users desire to reply to a thread.

        editingTopic is set to false to represent that we are not editing a topic, and setInTopic is true to represent that we are not creating a new topic and are in an existing topic.

        The thread we are replying to is saved in expectation that the user will finish the prompt and add the reply to the thread, whereupon it is inserted into the appropriate model in other methods

        Parameters:
        thread - that the user is replying to

      • createThread

        public void createThread(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String comment)
        Creates a new thread and inserts it into the model in response to a click listener.
        Parameters:
        title - of the thread
        body - of the thread
